scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "pnpm --filter apr-finder-backend start" "pnpm --filter apr-finder-frontend exec next start --hostname 0.0.0.0 --port 3000"
